snippet.title: At Home Alone Final | RPG Maker Horror | No Commentary
snippet.description:
Surely nothing bad could happen when you're home alone? ...No don't look at how long the video is.

Game: At Home Alone Final
Find the game here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1740100/At_Home_Alone_Final/
Original creator: 阿正不经
Release Date: 2022
Engine: RPG Maker VX Ace
I do NOT own anything on this video, all credit to their respective creators.

If the creator wants me to take this down, please tell me.
もしクリエイターがこれを削除することを望むなら、私に言ってほしい。 (DeepL)

A Chinese RPG Maker horror game, been a while since I did one of those.

You may recognize this game since it had 2 versions prior to the one I'm playing released in 2018 and 2019 respectively. This is just the most expanded-upon version of the game. Back then, this game had... an odd translation due to probably not being translated by any proficient English speakers (I assume.) 

That was the case for this version too until around January of this year when it got some "English Correction". I assume this isn't a full-on retranslation, but it's better than it was previously. Some dialogue is still a bit jank but nothing too immersion-breaking.

Now what do I think of this game... I think it's really good. It has some of the coolest moments I've seen in any RPG Maker game, the story is interesting even if a tad bit confusing, and it kept me invested from beginning to end, despite this actually being my second playthrough.

The main thing I feel like most people would have an issue with is that the first section is... very repetitive. It's meant to be but I do think the game picks up a lot once you get past it. Time loops do tend to be like that...

And this game also makes me sad about the fact there aren't many Chinese RPG Maker being translated, since some of the ones I've seen are so cool-looking. But anyway...

This game does a lot of things in its pretty short runtime and all for the price of free. You can't help but respect it. Even if the story si a bit confusing but I do think I got the gist of it. 

But anyway, good game. Play it if it interests you. I'm tired. Good night.

(...Would you believe me I procrastinated like 5 hours to record this thing. I need to get back to recording more consistently especially since I don't have much to do in the summer... No promises though.)

Timestamps (Somewhat wonky but eh. If I pause for a long time I probably too a timestamp note.)
00:00 Section 1
50:00 Section 2
01:22:00 Ending 1 (ANL)
01:38:00 Section 3
01:45:00 Ending 2 (FB)
01:56:00 Ending 3 (F)
02:02:20 Section 4
02:15:00 Finale
